cookie.logincaption: If you log in, cookies will be used.
cookie.logininfo: A cookie containing login information will be sent to your Web browser. If you do not want to receive cookies, you will be unable to log into the Web site.
cookie.usageinfo: In accordance with the Swedish electronic communications act, which came into force 25 July 2003, all visitors to a Web site that uses cookies must be notified that the Web site uses cookies, what their purpose is and how they can be blocked. On this Web site, cookies are used in the following instances:
cookie.usageform: If you are not logged in and respond to/submit a form, a cookie will be sent as a reminder to your computer that you have submitted the form.
cookie.usageloginform: When you log in, cookies are used to store your login information. If cookies are blocked during login, the login dialog box will appear for each new page that requires authentication.
cookie.usageloginwindows: When you log in, a cookie is used as a reminder that you are logged in. If cookies are blocked, you will be unable to maintain your logged in status on the Web site and will be continually asked to enter your login details each time you want access to password protected material.

frame.name: _blank
frame.description: Open the link in a new window

frame.name: _top
frame.description: Open the link in the whole window

validation.summary: The following problems must be corrected:

validation.invalidvalueexception: "{1}" is not a valid value for "{0}". ({2})

validation.valuealreadyused: "{0}" with value "{1}" is already in use by {2}.
validation.dateorder: The date for "{0}" must be before "{1}".
validation.valuesameasfolder: "{0}" with value "{1}" cannot be used since the value coincides with the path of the folder "{2}".
validation.urlcharactersonly: Only use characters a to z and 0 to 9 and hyphen(-).

login.persistentlogin: Enable automatic logon to this Web site

errorform.description: If you have found anything that doesn’t work, let us know so we can correct the error that may be causing the problem (don’t forget to describe what you did to generate the error).
errorform.messagesentdescription: Your message has now been sent. We will be examining your error description and taking action to correct it.

status.title: Page could not be loaded
status.description: The link you specified does not work. This may either be the result of temporary maintenance or an incorrect link.

status.title: Incorrect link
status.description: The link you gave does not work, either because the page it points to has been deleted or moved. If you clicked on a link, please inform the site’s webmaster that the link is faulty.

exception.title: Access denied
exception.description: You do not have sufficient rights to view this page.

exception.title: Page does not exist
exception.description: The link you gave does not work, either because the page it points to has been deleted or moved. If you clicked on a link, please inform the site’s webmaster that the link is faulty.

linktoolbar.deletefilemsg: Are you sure you wish to delete this file?
linktoolbar.deletefoldermsg: Are you sure you wish to delete this folder?
linktoolbar.toobigfile: The file exceeds the maximum size for uploading.
linktoolbar.maxuploadsize: Max allowed size for uploaded files:
linktoolbar.renamefileerror: Cannot change the file name. Reason:
linktoolbar.fileareadyexists: A file with the name "{0}" already exists.

viewtask.description: Display a task that has been assigned to a user.

edittask.description: Create a task and assign it to a user or group.

editutil.reqfield: You must enter a value in this field
editutil.badintegerfield: Invalid value, only digits allowed for
editutil.badfloatfield: Invalid value, decimal number required for
editutil.baddatefield: Dates should be entered as YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
editutil.helpheading: Name of the page, which will be used, for example, as a heading in the menus.
editutil.helpcreated: Date when the page was created
editutil.helpstartpublish: Publish the page from this date. If this field is left empty, the page will be published as soon as you have clicked the Publish button.
editutil.helpstoppublish: Publish the page up to this date. If this field is left empty, you must manually delete the page to stop it from being published.
editutil.helpupdatechanged: The date the page is changed will be updated if this box is selected. This is necessary for the page to be included in subscriptions, for example.
editutil.helpsortorder: Defines the order in which children of this page will be displayed.
editutil.helpsortindex: Specify an integer for the index number of this page. By selecting "According to sort index" for the parent of this page, the page with the lowest index will be shown at the top.
editutil.helpvisibleinmenu: Select this box if you want to display the page in the menus. If this box is empty, the page will only be displayed in listings.
editutil.helpoutputcache: Select this box if you want the page to be stored in the HTML cache and presented without being recreated by the ASP code. This can significantly enhance performance.
editutil.helplanguage: Set language encoding for page, if different from default
editutil.helpmoderated: Pages added under this folder must be approved by someone with Moderator access rights before they can be displayed.
editutil.helpexternalurl: Specify the path from the root of your Web site, for example "/products". This page can then be made accessible through a simple address without "?" or any other symbols. The visitor enters www.foretaget.se/products and the page will be displayed.
editutil.helpdynprop: Select this box to set the specified value for all child pages
editutil.helpdynpropdef: The property has a value defined on this page
editutil.sortorder7: According to Start publish date (oldest first)
editutil.sortorder8: According to Start publish date (latest first)
editutil.unloadmessage: You have made changes to this page
editutil.reloadmessage: You have made changes that require a reload of this page, any new information may get lost.
editutil.languagecommonpropertyicontooltiporigina: This property is common for all languages and can only be edited here
editutil.languagecommonpropertyicontooltiptransla: This property is common for all languages and can only be edited in the page's original language

globalizationcontrol.heading: Languages for Page "{0}"
globalizationcontrol.description: View the status of and access the different languages for the current page.

languagesettings.heading: Language Settings for Page "{0}"
languagesettings.inheritsettings: Inherit settings from the parent page: "{0}"
languagesettings.availablelanguagesdescriptionfirst: Pages in this part of the site should be available in the languages below. This means that pages can only be created in and translated to these languages.
languagesettings.availablelanguagesdescriptionsecond: This setting affects the languages that editors will have access to for this part of the site.
languagesettings.replacementlanguagesdescriptionfirst: Pages in this part of the site should, in the cases below, be displayed in a language other than the one the visitor has selected. This means that pages that are not available in these languages can instead be displayed in other languages.
languagesettings.replacementlanguagesdescriptionsecond: This setting could, for instance, be used when general information in a specific language should be available to all visitors no matter which language has been selected.
languagesettings.fallbacklanguagesdescriptionfirst: Pages in this part of the site may be made available in a language other than the one selected by the visitor. This means that pages that have not yet been translated and published in the selected language can instead be temporarily displayed in another language.
languagesettings.fallbacklanguagesdescriptionsecond: Please note that this setting may cause mixed languges in navigation and listings, which may be confusing for the visitor.
languagesettings.addwarning: Are you sure you want to have your own language settings for this page instead of inheriting the settings from the parent page?
languagesettings.deletewarning: Are you sure you want to delete the language settings for this page and inherit the settings from the parent page?

deletepagelanguage.heading: Delete Language for Page "{0}"
deletepagelanguage.info: Delete one of the languages for the page, without deleting the entire page. Note! When you delete a language for a page, it will be permanently deleted. This means that it will not be moved to the Recycle Bin. Any sub-pages in the same language will not be deleted.
deletepagelanguage.deletedlanguage: Language "{0}" has been deleted for this page.
deletepagelanguage.nothingtodelete: Only one language exists for this page. Use the "Delete" function if you want to delete the page and its sub-pages.
deletepagelanguage.confirmdeletemessage: If you continue, the selected language will be permanently deleted for the page.
deletepagelanguage.confirmdeletequestion: Are you sure you want to delete the language?

imageproperties.nolinkinfovalidationmessage: You have indicated that the image is to be connected to a link.

hyperlinkproperties.specifyimagemessage: Please specify an image before saving or change the selection to clickable text.

resizeimage.nosizevalidationmessage: Please specify the width and height of your choice before saving.

qualityinfo.low: Low quality gives poor level of sharpness compared to the original image, but results in a very low file size.
qualityinfo.medium: Medium quality gives a medium level of sharpness compared to the original image, but results in a quite low file size.
qualityinfo.high: High quality keeps a good level of sharpness compared to the original image, resulting in a slightly reduced file size.
qualityinfo.maximum: Maximum quality preserves the sharpness of the original image, resulting in a non-reduced file size.

saveoption.saveascopy: Save the resized image as a copy, preserving the original image.
saveoption.replaceoriginal: Replace the original image with the resized image (jpg images only).

resizeimage.imagenotfoundmessage: The specified image cannot be found.
resizeimage.notauthorizedmessage: You do not have access rights to change images in or add images to this folder.

admingroup.heading: Administer Groups
admingroup.info: Delete or add groups used to assign access rights.
admingroup.groupexists: There is already a group with name {0}
admingroup.newgroupinfo: Create group to be used in EPiServer
admingroup.syncinfo: Synchronize information about local groups with EPiServer
admingroup.ldapinfo: Import group information from LDAP server. Enter search expression in the field, for example User* will list all groups/OU:s beginning with User.

backup.heading: Backup
backup.devicequeryinfo: Note! Only database users assigned the role "sysadmin" can carry out this operation.
backup.info: Backup the database. Note that this will only backup the content of the database. The information will remain on the database server and must be copied to another location together with other EPiServer files to enable you to restore the system in the event of a catastrophic system failure.

license.heading: License Information
license.newfileinstalled: The new license file has been installed

categories.deleteprefix: Do you want to delete category
categories.heading: Categories
categories.info: Define the categories used by your Web site. These categories will be available in Edit mode for each page under the heading "Categories".
categories.helpgeneral: Click a category name to edit information about a category.
categories.helpadd: Add category below the selected category. Note that no changes will be made until you click Save.
categories.helpdelete: Delete category. Note that if the category has sub-categories, the sub-categories will be moved up one level.
categories.helpmoveup: Moves the category one step up in the list.
categories.helpmovedown: Moves the category one step down in the list.
categories.delreferenceprefix: One or more pages refers to the category (
categories.delreferenceconfirm: Do you still want to delete this category?

rebuildlinks.heading: Rebuild Web Addresses
rebuildlinks.rebuilddone: Internal Web addresses have been rebuilt.
rebuildlinks.info: You need to rebuild the Web addresses if the root folder (under System Settings) has been changed. If you do not do this, all internal links will point to the wrong place.
rebuildlinks.normalrebuild: Update Web addresses for all pages
rebuildlinks.newdirectoryrebuild: Set old root folder to be replaced

saveframes.heading: Frames

saveheadings.heading: Headings
saveheadings.referencedheadinghelp: If you still want to delete this heading, select the heading that the above properties should be placed under instead.

registrationsettings.heading: Settings for Extranet Users
registrationsettings.info: Modify settings that allow extranet users to register themselves. If users are activated automatically, they will receive the activation e-mail instead of the confirmation e-mail.
registrationsettings.emailtoaddress: E-mail address that handles new applications
registrationsettings.confirmationsubject: Subject on the outgoing e-mail on new applications
registrationsettings.confirmationbody: Body on the outgoing e-mail on new applications
registrationsettings.activationsubject: Subject on the outgoing e-mail on activating users
registrationsettings.activationbody: Body on the outgoing e-mail on activating users
registrationsettings.maxfailedattempts: Maximum number of failed logon attempts before account is locked

secedit.title: Title
secedit.tooshortpassword: Password must have at least {0} characters
secedit.symbolrequiredpassword: Password must contain symbols (characters other than letters and digits).
secedit.lockedout: Account locked (too many failed logon attempts)
secedit.ipaddress: Logon only from this IP address
secedit.ipmask: Subnet mask for IP address above

security.heading: Set Access Rights
security.info: Restore access rights in EPiServer for pages that you have, for example, completely removed access to. You can change all rights on all pages.

robotsearch.heading: Manage Web Addresses
robotsearch.linkinforobots: allow crawling by search engines on the Internet.

robotsearch.robotlinkcaption: Use Web addresses that allow search engines to crawl the Web site
robotsearch.norobotlinkcaption: Use Web addresses that only support interactive use
robotsearch.warning: Warning! Make sure that the templates used on this Web site are adapted to a particular type of Web address before changing this setting.

robotsearch.linkinfofriendly: reflect the structure of the content.

settings.heading: System Settings

settings.inforequired: Fields that must be filled in are marked with *
settings.epshosturlcaption: Address of your Web site (e.g. http://www.x.y)
settings.maxfilesize: Maximum allowed file size for uploaded files (KBytes)
settings.editordivonreturncaption: Use DIV in Editor instead of P
settings.epseditcsscaption: Path to CSS file for the Editor
settings.epnversioncountcaption: Maximum number of old versions of a page
settings.epfkeeploggedoncaption: Activate cookies to keep visitor logged on
settings.epssubmailbcccaption: Send copy of all e-mails to
settings.epssubtemplatecaption: XSL file for e-mail appearance (for example C:\mail.xsl)
settings.cachesyncinterval: How often the cache is updated on slave servers (seconds, 0 = no delay)
settings.epneditorwidthcaption: Width of the Editor (pixels, 0 = max. width)
settings.epseditcontrolversion: Current version of ActiveX Editor (for example 2,0,0,31)
settings.epsldapservercaption: LDAP server, e.g. company.com. Leave empty to disable LDAP functions
settings.epsldapusercaption: Connect to LDAP server as this user
settings.epserrormail: E-mail address to send error reports to

updateconfirm.heading: Confirm Access to Remote System
updateconfirm.info: This feature requires local administrator access. You will be presented with a login prompt if not already logged in as administrator. Information about current version and license will be sent using encrypted connection to ElektroPost to be able to present a custom product list.

update.heading: Upgrade Info
update.name: Product name
update.licensenotfound: License cannot be found in our database. Please contact your supplier for more information.
update.licenseexpired: License has expired. Please contact your supplier for more information.
update.licensereplaced: License has been replaced and it no longer active. Please contact your supplier for more information.
update.licensenosoftwareagreement: Licence has no software agreement. Please contact your supplier for more information.

siteinfo.heading: Statistics
siteinfo.dbstatpagecount: Total number of pages in database

syncgroup.heading: Group Synchronization
syncgroup.info: This page will synchronize group information between the EPiServer database and Windows.
syncgroup.syncnotneeded: Information in EPiServer is identical to the Windows group information. No changes needed.
syncgroup.notinwindowsinfo: Selected groups will be deleted from EPiServer
syncgroup.notindatabaseinfo: Selected groups will be added to EPiServer

systemerror.askclearlog: Do you want to clear the system log?
systemerror.heading: System Log
systemerror.info: Display information from the system log. Information about errors and events that may need to be remedied by the administrator is stored here.

wastebasket.description: Specify whether the emptying function is active/inactive and how often the Recycle Bin should be emptied. The Recycle Bin job will permanently delete pages older than 30 days from the Recycle Bin.

subscription.description: The subscription job sends e-mail to users that subscribe to receive updates in different sections of the Web site.

archive.description: Specify whether the archive function is active/inactive and how often pages should be archived. The archive function will move pages with expired stoppublishdate to selected archive folder if specified.

databasejob.schedulecaption: This job should be run every
databasejob.startokmessage: The job started without any problems.

edituser.usernotsaved: The user/group could not be saved
edituser.confirmdeleteuser: Do you want to remove the user/group {0} ?
edituser.notificationquestion: The user will automatically be notified by e-mail that the account has been activated.
edituser.notificationfailed: Could not send e-mail, because "Settings for extranet users" not properly set.
edituser.mailsent: E-mail has been sent to the user
edituser.passwordmismatch: Passwords differ between the input fields

settings.statusexpired: The page has scheduled publishing where the date and time have passed
settings.statusnotstarted: The page has scheduled publishing and has not been published yet
settings.statusnotpublished: The page has not been published
settings.statusnotvisibleinmenu: The page is not shown in menus
settings.statusreadonly: You do not have access rights to change the page
settings.statusnew: New page created within the last 48 hours
settings.statuslanguagemissing: The page is missing for the current language and will not be displayed
settings.statuslanguagefallback: The page is missing for the current language and will be displayed in another language. If the other language has an icon, it will be used as indication.

remotesite.heading: Remote Web Sites
remotesite.info: Registered remote Web sites for incoming and outgoing traffic. Access rights for remote sites and whether anonymous sites can connect is configured in web.config.
remotesite.name: Name
remotesite.pingtrue: Web site "{0}" responded and accepted signature
remotesite.pingfalse: Web site "{0}" responded, but did not accept signature, or no signature has been set

remotesiteedit.heading: Edit Remote Web Site
remotesiteedit.info: Do not change name of an external site, it may be used in code. Create a shared secret that has to manually be copied to the remote site to sign communications. This is to verify that data cannot be tampered with while transmitting over an insecure channel.
remotesiteedit.name: Name
remotesiteedit.istrustedwarning: Security warning! This site will be able to read assembly information about properties and access level settings. This will require a shared secret and valid signature on both sites to work properly.
remotesiteedit.allowurllookup: Allow site name in URLs (for example page.aspx?id=30__mysite)

setup.heading: Install Basic Content
setup.info: In order to start using EPiServer, it must first be given some basic content. Select one of the options listed below and system language. Finish by clicking "Complete installation".
setup.startpageexists: A start page is already configured for you
setup.progress: Please wait while the system is updated
setup.cancelmessage: Please return to this page later to complete installation
setup.swedishsample: Swedish sample templates with all templates installed
setup.englishsample: English sample templates with all templates installed
setup.emptysample: Only start page without any page types or content
setup.globalizationsample: Globalized sample templates (English and Swedish) with all templates installed

importdata.heading: Import Data
importdata.selectfile: Select an export file and upload
importdata.testsucceeded: Import file verified and no errors or warnings generated
importdata.warningsoccured: The following warnings have been generated

exportdata.heading: Export Data
exportdata.info: Export data from one EPiServer to another.
exportdata.exportsucceeded: Export completed without errors or warnings
exportdata.warningsoccured: The following warnings have been generated
exportdata.exportpagefiles: Export files that the pages link to

languages.deleteprefix: Do you want to delete language
languages.heading: Edit Language Codes
languages.info: Define the languages your Web site is using.

plugin.heading: Plug-in Manager
plugin.info: The list below displays components that have been registered as plug-ins in EPiServer.

pluginlicense.heading: License Information For
pluginlicense.newfileinstalled: The new license file has been installed

filemanagement.description: Upload and manage files and folders.

menuheadings.noscheduledjobstext: No scheduled jobs have been defined
menuheadings.notoolsettingstext: No tool settings have been defined
menuheadings.nopagetypestext: No page types have been defined

contentmirroring.description: The channels that are defined in the system.
contentmirroring.heading: Mirroring Administration
contentmirroring.info: Defines content channels to mirror content from EPiServer to an external system.
contentmirroring.name: Channel Name

contentmirroringview.heading: Destination Overview
contentmirroringview.info: An overview of the destinations that have been defined for this channel.
contentmirroringview.name: Destinations
contentmirroringview.resetwarning1: If you continue with this action, all pages will appear as created.
contentmirroringview.resetwarning2: This action will cause a loss of any items that have not been mirrored to the destination.
contentmirroringview.settingslocked: The settings for this channel and its destinations are locked, because a mirroring job has already been executed with the current settings. Any following jobs require identical settings in order for mirroring to be carried out correctly. Change the settings by clicking "Reset State" to reset information about previous jobs.
contentmirroringview.errorsamechannelname: The channel name "{0}" is already used by another channel
contentmirroringview.title: Destinations for Channel "{0}"

contentpublisheredit.heading: Destination
contentpublisheredit.info: Defines a receiver of changes sent from a channel.
contentpublisheredit.name: Name
contentpublisheredit.verifychecksum: Verify check sum for all pages every time
contentpublisheredit.usedirectoryweblinks: Do not include file name in links
contentpublisheredit.pathnameproperty: Use the following property for folder names
contentpublisheredit.linktootherchannels: Allow receiver to fetch links from other channels

contentmirroringedit.heading: Mirroring Settings
contentmirroringedit.name: Name
contentmirroringedit.noglobalizationsupport: Inactive (original language is mirrored to destination without globalization support)
contentmirroringedit.alllanguages: Active (all languages are mirrored to destination with globalization support)
contentmirroringedit.singlelanguage: Only "{0}" is mirrored to destination without globalization support

wsrpadmin.heading: WSRP Sources
wsrpadmin.info: Define the WSRP sources that should be available to consume.

confirmlanguagespecific.title: Warning
confirmlanguagespecific.heading: Values Will Be Deleted
confirmlanguagespecific.info: Property values will be deleted for pages that exist in languages that are not the original language.

editlanguagebranches.heading: Manage Web Site Languages
editlanguagebranches.info: Define the languages that should be available to visitors on your Web site.

editlanguagebranch.info: Define a new Web site language that should be available to visitors on your Web site.
editlanguagebranch.cantsavelanguagebranchexists: A Web site language for the selected language code, '{0}', already exists.
editlanguagebranch.warningchangelanguage: Warning! The language code is used in several places in the system, such as links and fallback languages. Only change this setting during initial configuration of the system.

contentmirroringmapping.title: Mirroring Mappings for "{0}"
contentmirroringmapping.message: This list displays how page and folder IDs are mapped between the source site and the remote site. By deleting a mapping, the target page or folder is disconnected from its source. Subsequent mirroring updates will result in a recreation of the target page or folder and a clean copy of any folder content.
contentmirroringmapping.deletemessage: Are you sure you want to delete this mapping?
contentmirroringmapping.deleteallmessage: Are you sure you want to delete all mappings for this channel?

contentmirroringqueue.title: Mirroring Queue for Destination "{0}" on "{1}"
contentmirroringqueue.info: Lists the pages that will be mirrored the next time the mirroring service is run.
contentmirroringqueue.warning: Warning! Pages that are deleted from the package will not be included when the Web site is mirrored. This may cause consequences for future mirroring. Do not click "Delete" if you want all the pages in the package to be included the next time the mirroring service is run.
contentmirroringqueue.deletewarningi0: Are you sure you want to delete changes from the queue?
contentmirroringqueue.deletewarningi1: You must manually apply move and delete operations on the destination site
contentmirroringqueue.deletewarningi2: You must republish updated and created pages

webpartadmin.heading: Register Web Parts
webpartadmin.info: Define the Web Parts that should be available for consumption
webpartadmin.name: Name

webpartadminedit.heading: Modify registration of "{0}"
webpartadminedit.info: Set the properties for the Web Part
webpartadminedit.infoconsume: Set the properties for the portlet
webpartadminedit.name: Name
webpartadminedit.requiredfield: A value must be entered for:
webpartadminedit.emptyvalueerror: The parameter value must be entered
webpartadminedit.typeconversionerror: The parameter value could not be converted to the selected type
webpartadminedit.nameexists: A Web Part already exists with the name '{0}'
webpartadminedit.typenameblank: You must enter a type name or a virtual path.
webpartadminedit.virtualpathloadfailed: The virtual path could not be loaded.
webpartadminedit.assemblyloadfailed: An error occured while loading the assembly.
webpartadminedit.typenamenotfound: A control with the specified type name could not be found.
webpartadminedit.ambiguoustypename: The specified type name is ambiguous. The name matches the following qualified names.
webpartadminedit.invalidcontrol: The specified control cannot be loaded.

filetools.editfilesummarytooltip: Edit file summary for the current file

pasteselection.confirmmove: {0} objects has been selected. Do you want to move these to the current folder?

filemanager.unauthorizedpagefoldercreation: You are not authorized to create page folders for this page.

wizard.createpage: Select the page type you want to base this document on.
wizard.editpage: Selected page type is {0}. Enter information such as page name and publish dates.
wizard.doneblock2: Select Save and view to finish this wizard and create a preview of this page.

officeaddin.noaccess: To be able to install and use this add-in, certain function permissions are required. An administrator can assign you these permissions.
officeaddin.heading: Microsoft Office Add-In
officeaddin.intro: This add-in enables you to publish information from within Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel and Microsoft PowerPoint to EPiServer.
officeaddin.activated: This Web site has been activated for publishing from your computer
officeaddin.notactivated: This Web site has not been activated for publishing from your computer
officeaddin.confirmactivate: Do you want to activate publishing to the following site?
officeaddin.confirmdeactivate: Do you want to deactivate publishing to the following site?
officeaddin.needssave: The document must be saved before you can publish it to EPiServer. Do you want to save the document now?

components.heading: Components
components.intro: Some functions in EPiServer require you to install EPiServer Client Components on your local computer. The list below displays available components and their status.

componentshelltools.heading: Client Support Functions
componentshelltools.description: Support functions to communicate with EPiServer, used by Microsoft Office add-in for example.

componentspellchecker.heading: Spellchecker, Microsoft Office Support
componentspellchecker.description: A component that enables the Editor to use Microsoft Word spellchecker.

componentexcelexport.heading: Export to Excel, Microsoft Office Support
componentexcelexport.description: A component that can export forms data to Microsoft Excel.

componentmultiupload.heading: Advanced File Upload
componentmultiupload.description: A component that enables support for advanced file upload, for example drag-and-drop.

property.name: PageName
property.caption: Name
property.help: Name of the page, which will be used, for example, as a heading in the menus.

property.name: PageLink
property.caption: Page ID
property.help: Specify the page’s unique ID

property.name: PageChangedOnPublish
property.caption: Mark page as changed
property.help: The date the page is changed will be updated if this box is selected. This is necessary for the page to be included in subscriptions, for example.

property.name: PageStartPublish
property.caption: Start publish
property.help: Publish the page from this date. If this field is left empty, the page will be published as soon as you have clicked the Publish button.

property.name: PageStopPublish
property.caption: Stop publish
property.help: Publish the page up to this date. If this field is left empty, you must manually delete the page to stop it from being published.

property.name: PageDelayedPublish
property.caption: Future publishing
property.help: Select this box to publish this version automatically at the "Start publish" date.

property.name: PageChildOrderRule
property.caption: Sort order
property.help: Defines the order in which children of this page will be displayed.

property.name: PagePeerOrder
property.caption: Sort index
property.help: Specify an integer for the index number of this page. By selecting "According to sort index" for the parent of this page, the page with the lowest index will be shown at the top.

property.name: PageVisibleInMenu
property.caption: Display page in menus
property.help: Select this box if you want to display the page in the menus. If this box is not selected, the page will only be displayed in listings.

property.name: PageFrameID
property.caption: Target frame
property.help: Determines how a link will be opened (target in <a href>).

property.name: PageArchiveLink
property.caption: Archive to page
property.help: This page can be archived to a special location when the "Stop publish date" has expired. Specify the page that will be used as the archive.

property.name: PageCreated
property.caption: Created
property.help: Date when the page was created.

property.name: PageChanged
property.caption: Changed
property.help: Date when the page was marked as changed.

property.name: PageTypeName
property.caption: Page Type
property.help: Name of page type.

property.name: PageExternalURL
property.caption: Simple address for this page
property.help: Specify the path from the root of your Web site, for example "/products". This page can then be made accessible through a simple address without "?" or any other symbols. The visitor enters www.foretaget.se/products and the page will be displayed.

property.name: PageCategory
property.caption: Category
property.help: Choose the categories you want your page to connect to.

property.name: PageShortcutType
property.caption: Link type
property.help: Choose which type of link you want to create.

property.name: PageShortcutLink
property.caption: Internal shortcut/Fetch data from
property.help: The page opens the content of another page and transfers the visitor to the page in question in the structure. / This page opens the content of another page and remains in the current location in the structure.

property.name: PageLinkURL
property.caption: External link
property.help: This page opens with the content from the external page or document you are linked to.

property.name: PageTargetFrame
property.caption: Target frame
property.help: Determines how a link will be opened (target in <a href>).

property.name: PageLanguageID
property.caption: Language encoding
property.help: Set language encoding for page if different than default.

property.name: PageURLSegment
property.caption: Page name in Web address
property.help: Assign a short name to be used for the page in the Web address

pagetype.name: SysRecycleBin
Recycle Bin
pagetype.description: Tree structure for Recycle Bin on the Web site

catalogzone.emptyzonetext: Catalog Zone contains no Catalog Parts.
catalogzone.instructiontext: Select the catalog you would like to browse.

connectionszone.connecttoconsumerinstructiontext: Create consumer connections for this Web Part.
connectionszone.connecttoconsumertext: Create a connection to a Consumer
connectionszone.connecttoproviderinstructiontext: Create provider connections for this Web Part.
connectionszone.connecttoprovidertext: Create a connection to a Provider
connectionszone.consumersinstructiontext: Web Parts that the current Web Part sends information to:
connectionszone.instructiontext: Manage the connections for the current Web Part.
connectionszone.noexistingconnectioninstructiontext: There are no active connections available in your Web Part. You may create a new connection by selecting the links above, if there are compatible Web Parts on the page.
connectionszone.providersinstructiontext: Web Parts that the current Web Part gets information from:

editorzone.emptyzonetext: Editor Zone contains no Editor Parts.
editorzone.errortext: There was an error applying one or more Editor Parts.
editorzone.instructiontext: Modify the properties of the Web Part, then click OK or Apply to apply your changes.

extendedwebpartzone.emptyzonetext: Add a Web Part to this zone by either dragging an RSS feed or by selecting it from a folder.
